ILC will serve as a key hub in Southeast Asia for delivering capability building in a real-life demonstration and learning environment . the role will provide an opportunity to work alongside and train directly with leaders from ILC & QB (e.g., AI, machine learning, IoT, trying on and showcasing disruptive uses of wearable technologies)
